pr_title: FM2-78 : Fix CIEL and LOINC concept sources empty result set  liquiba…

timeline.author: corneliouzbett
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -110,6 +110,32 @@
                                  referencedTableName="users" referencedColumnNames="user_id" />
     </changeSet>
 
+	<changeSet id="add_loinc_openmrs_concept_source_20200220" author="jecihjoy" dbms="mysql">
+		<preConditions onFail="CONTINUE">
+			<and>
+				<tableExists tableName="concept_reference_source" />
+				<sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concept_reference_source WHERE name='LOINC' AND retired = 0</sqlCheck>
+			</and>
+		</preConditions>
+		<sql><![CDATA[
+			INSERT into concept_reference_source (name, description, hl7_code, creator, date_created, uuid)
+			VALUES ('LOINC', 'LOINC (www.loinc.org)', 'LN', 1, now(), '248b31c8-72fa-4b96-8d3d-b200dded985e')
+		]]></sql>
+	</changeSet>
+
+	<changeSet id="add_ciel_openmrs_concept_source_20200220" author="jecihjoy" dbms="mysql">

timeline.message: FM2-78 : Fixed CIEL and LOINC concept reference sources empty result set liquibase error
FM2-78 : Removed strict liquibase preconditions for concept reference sources
